snippet: Among the victims, Dawn Hochsprung, the Sandy Hook Elementary School principal, and Mary Sherlach, a psychologist there, were dedicated to their students, colleagues and parents said.
abstract: Dawn Hochsprung, the Sandy Hook Elementary School principal, and Mary Sherlach, school psychologist there, are among  the six adults killed in the mass shooting at the Sandy Hook Elementary school in Newtown, Conn.

byline.original: By SAM DOLNICK and MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM

lead_paragraph: Among the victims, Dawn Hochsprung, the Sandy Hook Elementary School principal, and Mary Sherlach, a psychologist there, were dedicated to their students, colleagues and parents said.

headline.seo: Two Newtown Educators Went the Extra Mile for Students
headline.main: Two Educators Went the Extra Mile for Students
headline.print_headline: Two Educators Are Recalled as Going the Extra Mile for Students
